CustomField.description: Security Operations: Ensure proper security measures for the warehouse, including collaborating with security system vendors or a team of security professionals
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Security Operations: Ensure proper security measures for the warehouse, including collaborating with security system vendors or a team of security professionals -Monitor, maintain and ensure compliance for the warehouse Security system, which includes but is not limited to the CCTV and authorized access for HT staff and storage clients. -Ensure all relevant secured zones are properly secured at all times AND at the end of the day
CustomField.label: Security Operations
